events.message: I purchased a jacket last week, but it doesn’t fit and I’d like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue with the customer's purchase has been categorized under the Refund cluster for appropriate handling.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. from the refunds department to assist the customer.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with the refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
My order number is 458923. The jacket is brand new, I only tried it on once and it’s in perfect condition.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process for your jacket; you should see the credit back in 5-7 business days.
Great, thank you very much for handling this quickly. I appreciate your help with the refund.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please let us know if you have any further questions or concerns.
We wanted to follow up and ensure that you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory now.
Since your refund was successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now.
